name: CoRunner
description:
You play as a Virus!!!Earn Powerups and Kill Your Enemies, But don't hit the Obstacles , So You increase in Amount, Because We Are "STRONGER TOGETHER"

This game is made for Brackeys  Gamajam!!!

I'm not sure about the Web version. So If the Web version is Laggy, Please download the file and run it .

Credits : Sam

How to Play:

Move With Arrow and WASD Keys!!

Left Click to Kill the Enemies!!

Earn as much as PowerUps You  Can!!

The download link has a windows exe file . I'm sorry for Linux and Mac users :(
